One of the co-founders of the Independent newspaper Stephen Glover recently wondered why Chancellor George Osborne had co-written an editorial piece with outgoing Google CEO Eric Schmidt . I can't imagine a member of the Government doing a piece with Rupert Murdoch , Stephen Glover noted. You can imagine the reaction if he had. What's good for Google, it seems, must be good for the UK.? Google Apps for Business: Secure, reliable
